metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: The include tag allows you to include a template inside the current template.
content.html: The include tag allows you to include a template inside the current template.

content.text: This is useful when you have a block of content that is the same for many pages.
content.html: This is useful when you have a block of content that is the same for many pages.

content.code:
<
p
>
You have reached the bottom of this page, thank you for your time.
</
p
>
content.code_html: <p>You have reached the bottom of this page, thank you for your time.</p>

content.text: You can send variables into the template by using the with keyword.
content.html: You can send variables into the template by using the with keyword.

content.text: In the include file, you refer to the variables by using the {{ variablename }} syntax:
content.html: In the include file, you refer to the variables by using the {{ variablename }} syntax:

content.code:
<
div
>
HOME |
{{

me

}}
| ABOUT | FORUM |
{{

sponsor

}}
</
div
>
content.code_html: <div>HOME | {{ me }} | ABOUT | FORUM | {{ sponsor }}</div>

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
What is a corrext syntax for sending variables into a template via the include tag?
content.html: What is a corrext syntax for sending variables into a template via the include tag?
